title: Enchanting Emerald and Diamond Raasi Haaram
materials: meticulously embellished with brilliant-cut Diamonds (VVS clarity
G color) and featuring two vibrant Emerald cabochons. Features the signature Hyderabadi Polish for an enduring shine.
features: This contemporary Haaram showcases a delicate floral motif meticulously set with diamonds, creating a breathtaking symphony of light. The central pendant features an oval-cut Emerald cabochon surrounded by an intricate diamond setting, followed by a larger rounded pendant. The design expertly blends traditional floral elements with a modern, lightweight aesthetic, making it a versatile piece for any occasion.
colors: Predominantly gold and white (diamond) with vibrant emerald green accents. The contrasting colors enhance the richness and elegance of the piece.
occasions: and special occasions like family functions or corporate events. Its modern design also makes it suitable for evening wear and formal gatherings.
description: This Haaram is a statement piece that seamlessly blends tradition with modern elegance. Its lightweight design ensures comfortable wear, while the brilliant diamonds and vibrant emeralds add a touch of sophistication and timeless appeal. The Hyderabadi Polish guarantees lasting luster and durability. A perfect heirloom piece for generations to come.
